summary: "Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings" is a 2021 superhero movie about the Marvel Comics character Shang-Chi. Directed by Destin Daniel Cretton, the film stars Simu Liu as Shang-Chi and introduces an Asian-led cast and director to the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) for the first time. The story follows Shang-Chi as he confronts his father, the leader of a terrorist group, and searches for a mythical village with his sister. With an exciting plot and positive reviews, the film earned over $432 million worldwide and was praised for its representation of Asian culture.
title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
